goal: To develop a recommendation system that effectively predicts user preferences and suggests relevant items by analyzing user-item interaction patterns.
persona: A data scientist with 8 years of experience in building recommendation systems, specializing in collaborative filtering techniques. They are focused on understanding user behavior patterns and enhancing the relevance and diversity of recommendations for an improved user experience. Their interests include leveraging data sparsity and addressing the cold-start problem to refine the accuracy of the recommendation model.
